page.description: A list of web security functions in Alpha Anywhere.

section.title: [A5WS_Add_Group Function]
section.description: Adds a security group to the web security system

section.title: [A5WS_CreateSecurityFiles Function ]
section.description: Creates default security files for a web publishing project

section.title: [A5WS_Delete_Group Function ]
section.description: Deletes a security group from the web security system

section.title: [A5WS_Delete_User Function ]
section.description: Deletes a user identified by the user value from the web security system.

section.title: [A5WS_ExportUsers Function]
section.description: Displays a dialog to export selected web project user records.

section.title: [a5ws_GetGroupsDialog Function]
section.description: Return a list of security groups defined for the current project. It has no input parameters and should be used in place of the a5ws_Get_Groups in the V11 Dialog component.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_Groups Function]
section.description: Returns a list of security groups defined for the current web project

section.title: [A5WS_Get_Group_Assignments Function]
section.description: Returns a list of members of a named group.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_GUID_From_Group Function]
section.description: Returns the unique ID assigned to a security group in the group table.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_GUID_From_Ulink Function]
section.description: Returns a user GUID from a user ulink value.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_GUID_From_User Function]
section.description: Returns the unique ID assigned to a user ID

section.title: [A5WS_Get_LockedOutUsers Function]
section.description: Returns a CR-LF delimited list of userids currently locked out by the web security.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_Page_List Function]
section.description: Retrieves a CR-LF delimited list of pages with security status in a published web project.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_Security_Ques Function]
section.description: Retrieves a list of security questions.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_Ulink_From_GUID Function]
section.description: Returns a user's 'ulink' value from her unique web security identifier

section.title: [A5WS_Get_Users Function]
section.description: Returns a list of the userid values in the user table

section.title: [A5WS_Get_User_Assignments Function]
section.description: Returns a list of groups to which a user belongs.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_User_From_GUID Function]
section.description: Returns the guid for a userid value in the user table.

section.title: [A5WS_Get_User_Values Function]
section.description: Deprecated. Use A5WS_Get_WebUser_Values() instead

section.title: [A5WS_Get_WebUser_Values Function]
section.description: Populates control values in a dialog component from fields in the User table

section.title: [A5WS_ImportUsersDbf Function]
section.description: Displays a dialog to import selected user records.

section.title: [A5WS_LockOutUserRelease Function]
section.description: Releases a locked User Value.

section.title: [A5WS_LockOutUserSet Function]
section.description: Locks out a user value for a specified amount of time.

section.title: [A5WS_LockOutUserStatus Function]
section.description: Determines the locked out status of a user value

section.title: [A5WS_Logged_In_User_Values Function]
section.description: Returns field values from the user table for the current user.

section.title: [A5WS_Login_User Function]
section.description: Log in a user using the web security system

section.title: [A5WS_LogoutUser Function]
section.description: Removes all login information for the current user from the session.

section.title: [A5WS_OpenWebSecurity Function]
section.description: Displays the Web Security dialog

section.title: [A5WS_PageSecurity Function]
section.description: Displays the Page Security Assignment dialog

section.title: [A5WS_Save_User_Values Function]
section.description: Deprecated. Use A5WS_Save_WebUser_Values() instead.

section.title: [A5WS_Save_WebUser_Values Function]
section.description: Validates and saves dialog values to fields in the Web Security User table.

section.title: [A5WS_SecurityActive Function]
section.description: Determine if web security is active

section.title: [A5WS_SecurityQues Function]
section.description: Deprecated. Use A5WS_SecurityQuestions()

section.title: [A5WS_SecurityQuestions Function]
section.description: Displays the Login Recovery Security Questions dialog.

section.title: [A5WS_SecuritySettings Function]
section.description: Displays the Security Settings dialog.

section.title: [A5WS_User_File_Field_List Function]
section.description: Retrieve a list of the active fields for the web user table in the current project

section.title: [A5WS_User_Groups_Dialog Function]
section.description: Displays the web Users and Groups dialog

section.title: [A5WS_Validate_WebUser_Values Function ]
section.description: Validates values from controls in a dialog component for fields in the Web Security User table

section.title: [A5WS_WebUser_Exists Function]
section.description: Tests whether a user ID exists in the web security system
